world.constructs

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.constructs.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    Client sided mirror for a ship. It gets replaced very fast. Players check their coordinate relative to it using Michael's fancy rotation matrix.
    Version:
    2, 1
    Author:
    Michael Ferolito
